title: Community Media-Spheres and the Creative Citizen
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Findings used to prepare full bid. findingsText: We sought to clarify and shape the thinking which had emerged from the Birmingham Connected Communities Sandpit, where the research team first started to form and the concept of studying the relationship between digital media and communities started to emerge. This proved to be a demanding phase of activity, which involved a research team from six universities and a wide range of partners, small and large, grappling with ideas, theory and community practice. Supported by our 'international mentor' Professor John Hartley of Curtin University, Australia, we succeeded. There were no 'findings' as such from this work, which was intended to and did lead to a full bid.
